messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.Name: Community Bug-Fix Collection
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.Description: This mod contains fixes for various small Resonite Issues that are still open.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.CaseInsensitiv: Makes picking custom generic type parameters case-insensitive.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.BreakDragAndDr: Fixes copying components using drag-and-drop breaking drives.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.CheckSelfForDu: Fixes a crash when the OverrideParent of the Duplicate Slot ProtoFlux node is identical to the Template.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.ColorDisplayVa: Fixes ValueDisplay<color> not having a ValueProxySource component.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.ColorXNodeName: Fixes ProtoFlux node names containing ColorX being spaced wrong.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.CopySyncMember: Adds Copy to Clipboard action on any non-reference member fields in Inspectors.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.CorrectMateria: Fixes the MaterialGizmo being scaled twice when using Edit on the Material Tool.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.DuplicateAndMo: Fixes references between multiple duplicated or transferred-between-worlds items breaking.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.FireBrushToolD: Fixes tools derived from BrushTool not firing OnDequipped events.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.GammaCorrected: Fixes ColorX Luminance calculations being incorrect for non-linear color profiles.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.HighlightHomeW: Fixes the selected Home World in the Inventory not being highlighted as a favorite.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.ImportMultiple: Fixes it not being possible to import multiple audio clips at once.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.ImportWebFiles: Fixes URLs to text files or Resonite Packages failing to import instead of appearing as a hyperlink.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.IndependentlyS: Fixes direct cursor size becoming very large when snapped to an object much closer than the true cursor.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.NoLossOfColorP: Fixes Color Profile not being preserved on all operations.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.NoZeroScaleToo: Fixes a crash when a (multi)tool is scaled to zero.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.NodeNameAdjust: Fixes most ProtoFlux nodes in Strings > Constants having invisible names.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.NonHDRColorCla: Fixes non-HDR variants of Color(X) channel addition not clamping.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.PauseAnimatorU: Fixes animators updating all associated fields every frame while enabled but not playing.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.SmoothDraggabl: Workaround for Sliders and Joints snapping in sessions hosted by a headless.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.UserInspectorA: Fixes UserInspectors not listing existing users in the session for non-host users.
